inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Longsword', 'CriticalChance', 5); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Bastard Sword', 'CriticalChance', 5); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Greatsword', 'CriticalChance', 5); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Expert Training, Large Swords
description: You gain an additional +5 chance to inflict critical hits with longswords, bastard swords, and great swords.
